assignments.name: matching
assignments.value: ={{ $('Zendesk: Search by Email').item.json.body.items.length == 1 ? 'success' : $('Zendesk: Search by Email').item.json.body.items.length > 1 ? 'unclear' : 'failed' }}

    'AL': 'Albania',

parameters.content:
## Fill special fields (RESTARTABLE)
Convert values between systems
## Copy relevant data to NocoDBand match sides by email

## Update CS based on suggestions (RESTARTABLE)
# Before running, check if "unknown" matchings are resolved
## If a matching cannot be resolved: Set to matching = unclear

# SKIP THIS FOR NOW!
also: set attn for companies not implemented yet
## Copy unmatched contacts from ZD to CS (CONTINUABLE)
The matching table is based on CS, so entries which only exist in ZD so far, need to be copied over to CS once
During that, the CS ID needs to be stored in ZD

## ToDo
- [x] If phone number in CS 4 or less chars long, treat it as empty value
- [ ] Add logging to new NocoDB table of each ID which has been modified in a system AND/OR just always a loop and a .2 s wait
- [ ] Remove filters with test IDs
- [ ] Run once with all items on testing environments and check if needs batching + subworkflows (cannot be run entirely since ID's are different on syndbox - or run capturing from there as well)
- [ ] Update all NocoDB Table Ids in all nodes
## Create missing contacts in ZD (does not contain entries without a valid email)

parameters.jsCode:
// Define the target system (CS or ZD) here
const targetSystem = 'CS';

function convertCountryCStoZD(csCountry) {
  const countryMapping = {
    'AL': 'Albania',
    'AD': 'Andorra',
    'AT': 'Austria',
    'BY': 'Belarus',
    'BE': 'Belgium',
    'BA': 'Bosnia and Herzegovina',
    'BG': 'Bulgaria',
    'HR': 'Croatia',
    'CY': 'Cyprus',
    'CZ': 'Czech Republic',
    'DK': 'Denmark',
    'EE': 'Estonia',
    'FI': 'Finland',
    'FR': 'France',
    'DE': 'Germany',
    'GR': 'Greece',
    'HU': 'Hungary',
    'IS': 'Iceland',
    'IE': 'Ireland',
    'IT': 'Italy',
    'LV': 'Latvia',
    'LI': 'Liechtenstein',
    'LT': 'Lithuania',
    'LU': 'Luxembourg',
    'MT': 'Malta',
    'MD': 'Moldova',
    'MC': 'Monaco',
    'ME': 'Montenegro',
    'NL': 'Netherlands',
    'MK': 'North Macedonia',
    'NO': 'Norway',
    'PL': 'Poland',
    'PT': 'Portugal',
    'RO': 'Romania',
    'RU': 'Russia',
    'SM': 'San Marino',
    'RS': 'Serbia',
    'SK': 'Slovakia',
    'SI': 'Slovenia',
    'ES': 'Spain',
    'SE': 'Sweden',
    'CH': 'Switzerland',
    'UA': 'Ukraine',
    'GB': 'United Kingdom',
    'VA': 'Vatican City'
  };
  return countryMapping[csCountry] || csCountry;
}

function convertCountryZDtoCS(zdCountry) {
  const countryMapping = {
    'Albania': 'AL',
    'Andorra': 'AD',
    'Austria': 'AT',
    'Belarus': 'BY',
    'Belgium': 'BE',
    'Bosnia and Herzegovina': 'BA',
    'Bulgaria': 'BG',
    'Croatia': 'HR',
    'Cyprus': 'CY',
    'Czech Republic': 'CZ',
    'Denmark': 'DK',
    'Estonia': 'EE',
    'Finland': 'FI',
    'France': 'FR',
    'Germany': 'DE',
    'Greece': 'GR',
    'Hungary': 'HU',
    'Iceland': 'IS',
    'Ireland': 'IE',
    'Italy': 'IT',
    'Latvia': 'LV',
    'Liechtenstein': 'LI',
    'Lithuania': 'LT',
    'Luxembourg': 'LU',
    'Malta': 'MT',
    'Moldova': 'MD',
    'Monaco': 'MC',
    'Montenegro': 'ME',
    'Netherlands': 'NL',
    'North Macedonia': 'MK',
    'Norway': 'NO',
    'Poland': 'PL',
    'Portugal': 'PT',
    'Romania': 'RO',
    'Russia': 'RU',
    'San Marino': 'SM',
    'Serbia': 'RS',
    'Slovakia': 'SK',
    'Slovenia': 'SI',
    'Spain': 'ES',
    'Sweden': 'SE',
    'Switzerland': 'CH',
    'Ukraine': 'UA',
    'United Kingdom': 'GB',
    'Vatican City': 'VA'
  };
  return countryMapping[zdCountry] || zdCountry;
}

function splitZDLine1(line1) {
  if (!line1) return { street: '', house_no: '' };
  
  const streetMatch = line1.match(/^(.*?)\s+\d+[a-zA-Z0-9-]*\s*$/)?.[1] || line1;
  const houseNoMatch = line1.match(/\s(\d+[a-zA-Z0-9-]*)\s*$/)?.[1] || '';
  
  return {
    street: streetMatch,
    house_no: houseNoMatch
  };
}

function combineCStoLine1(street, houseNo) {
  if (!street && !houseNo) return '';
  return `${street} ${houseNo}`.trim();
}

function processItem(item) {
  let result = {};

  if (targetSystem === 'CS') {
    result = {
      id: item.cs_id || '',
      first: (item.choice_first === 'ZD' || (item.choice_first === 'identical' && item.zd_first)) ? item.zd_first : (item.cs_first || ''),
      last: (item.choice_last === 'ZD' || (item.choice_last === 'identical' && item.zd_last)) ? 
        `${item.zd_middle || ''} ${item.zd_last || ''}`.trim() : (item.cs_last || ''),
      email: item.cs_email || '',
      middle: item.cs_middle || '',
      street: (item.choice_street === 'ZD' || (item.choice_street === 'identical' && item.zd_line1)) ? 
        splitZDLine1(item.zd_line1).street : (item.cs_street || ''),
      house_no: (item.choice_house_no === 'ZD' || (item.choice_house_no === 'identical' && item.zd_line1)) ? 
        splitZDLine1(item.zd_line1).house_no : (item.cs_house_no || ''),
      city: (item.choice_city === 'ZD' || (item.choice_city === 'identical' && item.zd_city)) ? item.zd_city : (item.cs_city || ''),
      country: (item.choice_country === 'ZD' || (item.choice_country === 'identical' && item.zd_country)) ? 
        convertCountryZDtoCS(item.zd_country) : (item.cs_country || ''),
      zip: (item.choice_zip === 'ZD' || (item.choice_zip === 'identical' && item.zd_zip)) ? item.zd_zip : (item.cs_zip || ''),
      type: (item.choice_type === 'ZD' || (item.choice_type === 'identical' && item.zd_type)) ? 
        item.zd_type : (item.cs_type || ''),
      company_name: (item.choice_company === 'ZD' || (item.choice_company === 'identical' && item.zd_company_name)) ? 
        item.zd_company_name : (item.cs_company_name || ''),
      mobile: (item.choice_mobile === 'ZD' || (item.choice_mobile === 'identical' && item.zd_mobile)) ? 
        item.zd_mobile : (item.cs_mobile || ''),
      phone: (item.choice_phone === 'ZD' || (item.choice_phone === 'identical' && item.zd_phone)) ? 
        item.zd_phone : (item.cs_phone || '')
    };
  } else {
    result = {
      id: item.zd_id || '',
      first: (item.choice_first === 'CS' || (item.choice_first === 'identical' && item.cs_first)) ? item.cs_first : (item.zd_first || ''),
      last: (item.choice_last === 'CS' || (item.choice_last === 'identical' && item.cs_last)) ? item.cs_last : (item.zd_last || ''),
      line1: (item.choice_street === 'CS' || item.choice_house_no === 'CS' || 
                ((item.choice_street === 'identical' || item.choice_house_no === 'identical') && 
                (item.cs_street || item.cs_house_no))) ? 
        combineCStoLine1(item.cs_street, item.cs_house_no) : (item.zd_line1 || ''),
      city: (item.choice_city === 'CS' || (item.choice_city === 'identical' && item.cs_city)) ? item.cs_city : (item.zd_city || ''),
      country: (item.choice_country === 'CS' || (item.choice_country === 'identical' && item.cs_country)) ? 
        convertCountryCStoZD(item.cs_country) : (item.zd_country || ''),
      zip: (item.choice_zip === 'CS' || (item.choice_zip === 'identical' && item.cs_zip)) ? item.cs_zip : (item.zd_zip || ''),
      type: (item.choice_type === 'CS' || (item.choice_type === 'identical' && item.cs_type)) ? 
        item.cs_type : (item.zd_type || ''),
      company_name: (item.choice_company === 'CS' || (item.choice_company === 'identical' && item.cs_company_name)) ? 
        item.cs_company_name : (item.zd_company_name || ''),
      mobile: (item.choice_mobile === 'CS' || (item.choice_mobile === 'identical' && item.cs_mobile)) ? 
        item.cs_mobile : (item.zd_mobile || ''),
      phone: (item.choice_phone === 'CS' || (item.choice_phone === 'identical' && item.cs_phone)) ? 
        item.cs_phone : (item.zd_phone || '')
    };
  }

  return result;
}

// Process the current item
return processItem($input.item.json);

function convertCountryCStoZD(csCountry) {
  const countryMapping = {

}

  if (!line1) return { street: '', house_no: '' };
  
  const streetMatch = line1.match(/^(.*?)\s+\d+[a-zA-Z0-9-]*\s*$/)?.[1] || line1;
  const houseNoMatch = line1.match(/\s(\d+[a-zA-Z0-9-]*)\s*$/)?.[1] || '';
  
  return {
    street: streetMatch,
    house_no: houseNoMatch

}

function combineCStoLine1(street, houseNo) {
  if (!street && !houseNo) return '';
  return `${street} ${houseNo}`.trim();
}

function processItem(item) {
  let result = {};

  if (targetSystem === 'CS') {
    result = {
      id: item.cs_id || '',
      first: (item.choice_first === 'ZD' || (item.choice_first === 'identical' && item.zd_first)) ? item.zd_first : (item.cs_first || ''),
      last: (item.choice_last === 'ZD' || (item.choice_last === 'identical' && item.zd_last)) ?

      email: item.cs_email || '',
      middle: item.cs_middle || '',

      house_no: (item.choice_house_no === 'ZD' || (item.choice_house_no === 'identical' && item.zd_line1)) ?

      city: (item.choice_city === 'ZD' || (item.choice_city === 'identical' && item.zd_city)) ? item.zd_city : (item.cs_city || ''),
      country: (item.choice_country === 'ZD' || (item.choice_country === 'identical' && item.zd_country)) ?

        combineCStoLine1(item.cs_street, item.cs_house_no) : (item.zd_line1 || ''),
      city: (item.choice_city === 'CS' || (item.choice_city === 'identical' && item.cs_city)) ? item.cs_city : (item.zd_city || ''),

        item.cs_phone : (item.zd_phone || '')
    };
  }

  return result;
}

// Process the current item
return processItem($input.item.json);

nodes.name: If company without a known ZD ID

parameters.content: Paginate until all timestamps found are older then previously stored one

parameters.jsCode:
// Define the target system (CS or ZD) here
const targetSystem = 'ZD';

function convertCountryCStoZD(csCountry) {
  const countryMapping = {
    'AL': 'Albania',
    'AD': 'Andorra',
    'AT': 'Austria',
    'BY': 'Belarus',
    'BE': 'Belgium',
    'BA': 'Bosnia and Herzegovina',
    'BG': 'Bulgaria',
    'HR': 'Croatia',
    'CY': 'Cyprus',
    'CZ': 'Czech Republic',
    'DK': 'Denmark',
    'EE': 'Estonia',
    'FI': 'Finland',
    'FR': 'France',
    'DE': 'Germany',
    'GR': 'Greece',
    'HU': 'Hungary',
    'IS': 'Iceland',
    'IE': 'Ireland',
    'IT': 'Italy',
    'LV': 'Latvia',
    'LI': 'Liechtenstein',
    'LT': 'Lithuania',
    'LU': 'Luxembourg',
    'MT': 'Malta',
    'MD': 'Moldova',
    'MC': 'Monaco',
    'ME': 'Montenegro',
    'NL': 'Netherlands',
    'MK': 'North Macedonia',
    'NO': 'Norway',
    'PL': 'Poland',
    'PT': 'Portugal',
    'RO': 'Romania',
    'RU': 'Russia',
    'SM': 'San Marino',
    'RS': 'Serbia',
    'SK': 'Slovakia',
    'SI': 'Slovenia',
    'ES': 'Spain',
    'SE': 'Sweden',
    'CH': 'Switzerland',
    'UA': 'Ukraine',
    'GB': 'United Kingdom',
    'VA': 'Vatican City'
  };
  return countryMapping[csCountry] || csCountry;
}

function convertCountryZDtoCS(zdCountry) {
  const countryMapping = {
    'Albania': 'AL',
    'Andorra': 'AD',
    'Austria': 'AT',
    'Belarus': 'BY',
    'Belgium': 'BE',
    'Bosnia and Herzegovina': 'BA',
    'Bulgaria': 'BG',
    'Croatia': 'HR',
    'Cyprus': 'CY',
    'Czech Republic': 'CZ',
    'Denmark': 'DK',
    'Estonia': 'EE',
    'Finland': 'FI',
    'France': 'FR',
    'Germany': 'DE',
    'Greece': 'GR',
    'Hungary': 'HU',
    'Iceland': 'IS',
    'Ireland': 'IE',
    'Italy': 'IT',
    'Latvia': 'LV',
    'Liechtenstein': 'LI',
    'Lithuania': 'LT',
    'Luxembourg': 'LU',
    'Malta': 'MT',
    'Moldova': 'MD',
    'Monaco': 'MC',
    'Montenegro': 'ME',
    'Netherlands': 'NL',
    'North Macedonia': 'MK',
    'Norway': 'NO',
    'Poland': 'PL',
    'Portugal': 'PT',
    'Romania': 'RO',
    'Russia': 'RU',
    'San Marino': 'SM',
    'Serbia': 'RS',
    'Slovakia': 'SK',
    'Slovenia': 'SI',
    'Spain': 'ES',
    'Sweden': 'SE',
    'Switzerland': 'CH',
    'Ukraine': 'UA',
    'United Kingdom': 'GB',
    'Vatican City': 'VA'
  };
  return countryMapping[zdCountry] || zdCountry;
}

function splitZDLine1(line1) {
  if (!line1) return { street: '', house_no: '' };
  const streetMatch = line1.match(/^(.*?)\s+\d+[a-zA-Z0-9-]*\s*$/)?.[1] || line1;
  const houseNoMatch = line1.match(/\s(\d+[a-zA-Z0-9-]*)\s*$/)?.[1] || '';
  return {
    street: streetMatch,
    house_no: houseNoMatch
  };
}

function combineCStoLine1(street, houseNo) {
  if (!street && !houseNo) return '';
  return `${street} ${houseNo}`.trim();
}

function processItem(item) {
  if (targetSystem === 'ZD') {
    return {
      id: item.zd_id || '',
      first: item.cs_first || '',
      last: item.cs_last || '',
      line1: combineCStoLine1(item.cs_street, item.cs_house_no) || '',
      city: item.cs_city || '',
      country: convertCountryCStoZD(item.cs_country) || '',
      zip: item.cs_zip || '',
      type: item.cs_type || '',
      company_name: item.cs_company_name || '',
      mobile: item.cs_mobile || '',
      phone: item.cs_phone || ''
    };
  } else {
    const zdAddressParts = splitZDLine1(item.zd_line1);
    return {
      id: item.cs_id || '',
      first: item.cs_first || '',
      last: item.cs_last || '',
      email: item.cs_email || '',
      middle: item.cs_middle || '',
      street: zdAddressParts.street || item.cs_street || '',
      house_no: zdAddressParts.house_no || item.cs_house_no || '',
      city: item.cs_city || '',
      country: convertCountryZDtoCS(item.zd_country) || item.cs_country || '',
      zip: item.cs_zip || '',
      type: item.cs_type || '',
      company_name: item.cs_company_name || '',
      mobile: item.cs_mobile || '',
      phone: item.cs_phone || ''
    };
  }
}

// Process the current item
return processItem($input.item.json);
